properties.title: Spa Resort Breiten
properties.abstract: Breiten is located at the heart of the Aletsch UNESCO World Heritage site, on a sunny terrace 900 m above the valley, directly beneath Riederalp. It boasts being the only recognized thermal brine spa in the Swiss Alps.
properties.description:
The small resort at the heart of stunning nature, bribes with multiple health, wellness and holiday offers. The relaxed atmosphere of the alpine spa is the ideal place to find peace and quiet.

In the thermal baths and wellness centre of the Salina Maris**** Hotel, guests enjoy 33°C warm salt water with high mineral content from Switzerland’s depths. Direct access with lift to the alpine brine-bath, spa and fitness centre (gym, physiotherapy, electrotherapy, massages, sauna, steam-bath, solarium, brine packings, medical advice).
